unnormalised: Arrey yaar, crypto-nt invest korun mhoje Rs. 5000 pan budle! Atam hanv poryatlea FD'nk porton voitan, interest rate fokot 6.5% p.a. aslem tori. Kamit tori hanv sokall utthun mhaje jivit-bhoranche zoddnne eka lognachya jalebi bhaxen fulo marun gele dakttoch na! Zanv dhi hanv India vs. Pakistan-chea match-ant betting korun ravtan; thoim thorachi bhavki mellta mhunnta hanv tuka.
normalised: Arrey yaar, kripto-nt invest korun mhaje panch hazar rupaye-i budle! Aata hanv parat dhaktem F-D-k gel'lom, interest rate fakt so point panch percent aslyari. Kam-se-kam mhaka utthun dakhon gelear mhaji jeevan-bharichi kamai lagna-nt zalebi bhaxen gayab zaunchi na! Kiteak hanv India ani Pakistan match-acher betting kartolo; thoint better odds asat, hanv tuka sangta.
text: Arrey yaar, crypto-nt invest korun mhoje Rs. 5000 pan budle! Atam hanv poryatlea FD'nk porton voitan, interest rate fokot 6.5% p.a. aslem tori. Kamit tori hanv sokall utthun mhaje jivit-bhoranche zoddnne eka lognachya jalebi bhaxen fulo marun gele dakttoch na! Zanv dhi hanv India vs. Pakistan-chea match-ant betting korun ravtan; thoim thorachi bhavki mellta mhunnta hanv tuka.
